message:
Cool addition to a library: http://www.theverge.com/2011/11/12/2557217/public-library-in-new-york-is-getting-a-hacker-lab  "The library — which is fittingly housed in a former furniture factory — is getting a Fab Lab to encourage makers and hackers, and will include equipment such as a MakerBot, a CNC router, and a laser cutter. 

The library's plans include offering free classes such as an introductory course in 3D printing, 3D design software training, and computer programming. "
